channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What founders need to know before choosing their exit — straight from Jai Das and Roseanne Wincek — at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Startups face more exit options — and more uncertainty — than ever before. That’s why we’re bringing this essential conversation to the Going Public S...

item.title: xAI’s legal chief steps down after whirlwind year
item.description: Robert Keele said this week that he has stepped down as xAI’s head of legal after just over a year, saying he wants to spend more time with his childr...

item.title: Best Wireless Headphones (2025): Tested Over Many Hours
item.description: Whether you need workout earbuds or gaming over-ears, these WIRED-tested picks sound like a million bucks.

item.title: Openvibe combines news and social media in one app
item.description: Openvibe, an app for tracking the open social web in one place, now supports RSS.

item.title: Google tests revamped Google Finance with AI upgrades, live news feed
item.description: Users will now be able to research their financial questions with AI, access advanced charting tools, and get real-time data and news.

item.title: It Looks Like a School Bathroom Smoke Detector. A Teen Hacker Showed It Could Be an Audio Bug
item.description: A pair of hackers found that a vape detector often found in high school bathrooms contained microphones—and security weaknesses that could allow someo...

item.title: Meta acquires AI audio startup WaveForms
item.description: WaveForms, founded just eight months ago, last raised $40 million in a round led by Andreessen Horowitz that valued the company at $160 million pre-mo...

item.title: Hoto Snapbloq Tools Review: Attractive Power Tools
item.description: These power tools may not be the best tools for the job, but the attractive designs may inspire you to fix that ol’ gadget.

item.title: 21 Best Festival Accessories and Gear (2025): The Essentials and the Fun Stuff
item.description: No matter the genre or location, these gadgets will upgrade your experience.

item.title: The Best OTC Hearing Aids (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested hearing aids are affordable alternatives to prescription devices. No doctor’s appointment necessary.
